DOC.brief_summary: This trial will evaluate the outcome of placement of silicone breast prosthetics.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating the Effectiveness and Outcomes of Silicone Breast Prosthetics
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will be evaluated for complications following placement of silicone breast prostheses.
DOC.criteria: over 18 undergoing breast reconstruction patients with collagen vascular diseases, rheumatoid arthritis, scleroderma, etc.
